title: Azhagho Azhaghu Lyrics Samar Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Azhagho Azhaghu
Singer: Naresh Iyer
Movie: Samar
Music : Yuvan Shankar Raja
Lyrics: Na. Muthukumar
Other Song Lyrics
Azhago Azhagu
Poikkaal Kuthirai
Vellai Mayil
Rajaavin Thotathil
Oru Kannil Vegam
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Azhagho Azhaghu aval kannazhagu
aval pol illai oru perazhagu
Azhagho Azhaghu aval pechazhagu
arugil aerikkum aval moochazhagu

Thaththi nadakam, aval nadai azhagu
kaththi aeriyum, aval udai azhagu

ayyayyo chick-ena nadakum
ayyayyo oviyam avalao
ayyayyo sakkarai thadavi
ayyayyo senjadhu udalao ... azhago azhagu

Endha poovil irundhu vandhadhindha thaeno
endru ennai viyakkum idhal azhagu
Andhiyile vaanam sivandhadhai polaey
kannam engum thondrum vetkam azhagu

Mellidaiyai pattri sonnaal
nillaadha azhagu
Meley konjam paarka sonnaal
Uzhaga azhagu

Kaataruvi poley azhai azhaiyaaga
Kannadapadi odum kuzhazhagu
Kannil rendu vazhayayai
pinni pinni veesi
nenjam andhai parikkum seyal azhagu

Pettu pallil srikkayil
theeraadha azhagu
Thalli nindru yosikayil
veredhum azhagu

Azhagho Azhaghu aval kannazhagu
aval pol illai oru perazhagu
Azhagho Azhaghu aval pechazhagu
arugil aerikkum aval moochazhagu

Thaththi nadakam, aval nadai azhagu
kaththi aeriyum, aval udai azhagu

ayyayyo chick-ena nadakum
ayyayyo oviyam avalao
ayyayyo sakkarai thadavi
ayyayyo senjadhu udalao ... ayyayyo English Translation
